attributes.additional_details:
The Duchy of Cornwall has a population of 535,300. It has a patron saint, own flag and a council which runs for the entire county. The Capital city is Truro and it's largest town is Saint Austell. Cornwall is one of 6 Celtic Nations with Ireland, Scotland, Isle of Man, Wales and Brittany. The Cornish language is also a proud feature of the duchy along with it's notable and world famous pasty. If Cornwall was independent from the UK, There would be a suitable economy from Cornwall by Tourism, Food and it's China Clay Industry.

FREE CORNWALL OUT OF THE UK.
